dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile represents the 50 states, the District of Columbia, and Puerto Rico of the United States at 1:100,000 scale.This layer also includes demographic data such as population and household information. This layer is part of the 2014 ESRI Data and Maps collection for ArcGIS 10.2. U.S. States provides boundaries and demographic information for the U.S. states. The boundaries are consistent with the block group, tract, and county datasets and are effective at regional and state levels. TomTom North America and ESRI. (2014). U.S. States, 2007-2013. ESRI. Available at: http://purl.stanford.edu/dw020nn0038
